definitions.definition: An autumn constellation of the northern sky whose brightest three stars form a small triangle . It lies near Perseus , between Aries and Andromeda .
The Triangulum Galaxy , a relatively nearby spiral galaxy to the Milky Way ; M33 .

main_definition: ( astronomy ) An autumn constellation of the northern sky whose brightest three stars form a small triangle . It lies near Perseus , between Aries and Andromeda .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) The Triangulum Galaxy , a relatively nearby spiral galaxy to the Milky Way ; M33 .
